display_long_description:
# El Bandito
El Bandito is an on-rails western shooter set in a vibrant, cartoonish universe filled with quirky characters and intense shootouts. Engage in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay with immersive, rhythm-driven mechanics. Play in single player story mode or with up to 4 players as local competition in party mode on same headset.  

Explore a variety of western environments from saloons and dusty towns to haunted marshlands,  forests and dangerous canyons  on 3 difficulty levels. Highest scores are tracked on global leaderboards. 

## Mechanics
Each encounter is scored based on your gun-swinging speed, accuracy and timing: perfect headshots, consecutive combos, quick reloads, and dodging enemy fire all contribute to a higher score. Look out for collectables, interactables and explosives! Features include optional aim assistance, gesture controlled or automatic reloading.

Action-Packed VR Combat: You’ll be constantly on the move on foot, horseback, canoe, raft or even in a mine cart, dodging, shooting and switching guns.

## Story Mode
As you level up becoming more notorious, your reputation as a bandit grows unlocking new levels, weapons and a variety of game modifiers including new outfits, animals, different weather settings and randomizations. Complete different challenges, take down increasingly tougher enemies as difficulty increases and wreak havoc to gain victory!

## Party Mode
Up to 4 player local competition mode for the highest score. 

Free demo is available in store!
